DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study assess relative bioavailability Nascobal Nasal Spray compare IM injection cyanocobalamin ( European reference product ) .
DOC.brief_title: Characterization Cyanocobalamin Healthy Voluteers After Intranasal Intramuscual Administration
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , randomize , single-dose , two-way crossover study . The study consist screen visit , two 4-days confinement period follow-up telephone call . The two confinement period separate washout period least 28 day .
DOC.criteria: Healthy female male voluteers 1840 year age BMI 18.5 30.0 kg/m2 Females pregnant lactate History clinically significant metabolic , hepatic , renal , haematological , pulmondary , cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , urological , neurological phychiatric disorder Serum vitamin B12 < =250 pmol/L MMA > =0.40 umol/L Evidence significant intranasal pathology Nasal congestion , allergic rhinitis upper respiratory tract infection
